Falters at times: The claim falters by relying on a news release from the New Hampshire Tea Party Coalition and polls by the University of New Hampshire Survey Center, which may introduce biases or limitations in the data.
Contradict fact: It is unclear if the claim contradicts any specific facts, as the given expert's verdict does not provide enough information to determine this bias.
